tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE tournament_schedule (tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tournament_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, location VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE TournamentSchedule (
	schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	tournament_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE NOT NULL,
	location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TournamentLocation (
	location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	address TEXT,
	city TEXT,
	state TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TournamentSchedule (
  tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tournament_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Tournament (
  tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tournament_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Match (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tournament_id INT,
  match_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  winner_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE tournament_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tournament_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT,
    country TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tournament_match (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    match_date DATE,
    match_time TIME,
    team1_name TEXT,
    team2_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE match_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    winning_team INT,
    losing_team INT,
    result TEXT
);
